exceptions.exn: In environment I, X, Y, Z : Type R', R1' : relation2 X Y S' : relation2 Y Z R, R1 : relation2 X Y S : relation2 Y Z T', T : relation X F', F : I -> relation2 X Y H : incl T T' x, y, x0 : X H1 : T x x0 H2 : star T x0 y Unable to unify "T x x0" with "T x x".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Unable to apply lemma of type "incl T T'" on hypothesis of type "star T x0 y".

In environment I, X, Y, Z : Type R', R1' : relation2 X Y S' : relation2 Y Z R, R1 : relation2 X Y S : relation2 Y Z T', T : relation X F', F : I -> relation2 X Y H : incl T T' x, y, x0 : X H1 : T x x0 H2 : star T x0 y Unable to unify "star T x0 y" with "star T' x y".

original: intros. unfold incl, plus. intros. unfold union, comp. intros. destruct H0 as [x [H1 H2]]. exists x. split. - apply H. apply H1. - apply H in H2. apply H2.
